name: Get Domain from Reverse IP
description: Discover all domains hosted on a specific IP address through DomainTools Iris Investigate API. Identify shared hosting relationships, virtual host configurations, and related infrastructure to map attack surfaces and detect malicious co-hosted domains

ip.description: The IP address to search for hosted domains (e.g., 8.8.8.8)

limit_exceeded.description: Indicates if the API response limit per page has been exceeded

has_more_results.description: Indicates if additional results are available beyond the current response

message.description: Status message from DomainTools API (e.g., 'Enjoy your data.')

results_count.description: Number of domains hosted on the IP in the current response

total_count.description: Total number of domains currently or historically hosted on the queried IP address

results.description: Array of domains that resolve or have resolved to the specified IP address, including active and historical hosting relationships

domain.description: Domain name hosted on the IP address

risk_score.description: Overall risk score for the domain (0-100, where higher values indicate greater risk)

first_seen.description: Date and time when the domain was first observed on this IP

value.description: First seen timestamp in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2023-06-10T11:55:34Z')

count.description: Number of domains using this server type
Number of domains with this title

missing_domains.description: Array of domain names that were queried but not found in the DomainTools database
